tags.name:
editable-list-item

tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `editable-list-item`
 * @customElement editable-list-item
 * `an individual list item`
 *
 * @microcopy - language worth noting:
 *  - an item is a thing in a list of many which can be modified
 *

 * @polymer
 * @demo demo/index.html
 */

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value that gets bound into the text field

attributes.name: edit-mode
attributes.description: ability to edit the items in the list

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value that gets bound into the text field

properties.name: editMode
properties.description: ability to edit the items in the list
